rukus.text: And We helped the Children of Israel reach a place of sanctity, and We provided them from the good things, and they did not differ until the knowledge came to them. Your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection for what they differed in
If you are in doubt regarding what We have sent down to you, then ask those who have been reading the Book from before you. The truth has come to you from your Lord, so do not be of those who doubt
And do not be of those who have denied the revelations of God, for you will be of the losers
Those who have deserved the retribution of your Lord do not believe
Even if every sign were to come to them; until they see the painful retribution

If there was any town that benefited from its belief, then that was the people of Jonah. When they believed, We removed from them the retribution of disgrace in this worldly life, and We let them enjoy until a time
And had your Lord willed, all the people on the earth in their entirety would have believed. Would you force the people to make them believe
And it is not for a soul to believe except with the permission of God. And He lets taint those who do not comprehend
Say: "Look at all that is in the heavens and the earth." But what good are the signs and warnings to a people who do not believe
Are they waiting for the days like those who have passed away before them? Say: "Wait, for I am with you waiting
Then We will save Our messengers and those who believe. It is thus binding upon Us that We save the believers
